attributes.action: To search kids for knifes when they enter school
attributes.additional_details: It would prevent children from carrying knives into school. It will also mean that people who feel they need to carry knives are able to get the support so that they no longer feel that they have to carry knives. Aswell as this it would lower crime rates around the UK and would make kids feel much safer in school.
attributes.background: Have students searched for knives upon entering schools. Have metal detectors at the entrances so that children who carry knives will be flagged up and stopped.
